title: Spacious 3 Bedroom at Gardenwood Apartments. Available Now!
posting_body: ['Welcome to Gardenwood Apartments!', '1110 Garden Walk Blvd College Park, GA 30349', 'Rental Size:', '3 BR - 2 BA - 1348 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', '$1860 |', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Nestled in 35 acres of wooded landscape, Gardenwood is conveniently located in close proximity to Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport with easy access to I-75 and I-285.', 'We offer spacious 1, 2, and 3 garden-style apartments, featuring walk-in closets, wood-burning fireplaces, sunrooms with ceiling fans, and a multitude of other luxury features.', 'Please call for an appointment today!', 'Our community features:', '◾ 24hr.', 'Emergency maintenance', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Cabana', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Controlled Access Gates', '◾ Corporate Housing', '◾ Excellent access', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Great guest parking', '◾ Grill', '◾ Nature Trails', '◾ On Marta Busline', '◾ On-Site Maintenance', '◾ Organized Activities', '◾ Package Service', '◾ Pet Care', '◾ Sports court (outside)', '◾ Two playground areas', '◾ Two pools', '◾ Vintage Building', 'Our unit features:', '◾ Air conditioning - central air', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Carpet', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Dining Room', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Family Room', '◾ Fireplace - Wood Burning', '◾ Hardwood Floors', '◾ Patio/Balcony', '◾ Range w/Oven', '◾ Refrigerator w/Ice Maker', '◾ Smoke Free', '◾ Sunroom', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Washer/Dryer Connections in 2 & 3 BR', '◾ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', '◾ Window Coverings', 'Contact us for more information!', '--', 'show contact info', '--', 'Our Pet-Policy:', 'We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 non-refundable pet fee for each pet.', 'The weight limit is 50 pounds per pet.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please contact leasing office for complete pet policy details.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'EF2E8D3BE7334F5']
